name: Memory Butterfly

physical_description.appearance: A delicate butterfly with translucent wings that shimmer with trapped memories. Patterns on its wings shift and change, showing glimpses of forgotten moments.
distinguishing_features: Wings showing moving images of memories
Antenna that glow when sensing important information
Wing patterns that change based on emotional state

abilities.name: Memory Archive
abilities.description: Can store and replay important memories for its bonded companion

abilities.name: Hidden Path Recall
abilities.description: Remembers every path taken and can guide return journeys perfectly

abilities.name: Emotional Resonance
abilities.description: Senses and responds to its companion's emotional needs

companion_abilities.manifestation_form: Visual replay of memories and emotional comfort through wing-pattern displays

habitat.territorial_behavior: Drawn to locations with strong emotional imprints, non-territorial

lore_significance: Memory Butterflies serve as living archives for their bonded companions, providing perfect recall of important moments and emotional support through their wing displays. Their Myriel fragments allow them to store and replay memories, creating a mystical backup system that helps adventurers navigate complex situations by remembering crucial details they might have forgotten.
